text.0: Several agents have been evaluated for the treatment of Covid-19, but no antivirals have yet been shown to be efficacious. Remdesivir was identified as a possible therapeutic candidate owing to its ability to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro. https://t.co/MFJXSDr13s
text.1: Linda McCauley discusses historical and current concerns related to the health of U.S. veterans.
text.2: The NEJM Clinical Cases Resource Center aggregates interactive cases and educational resources developed specifically for teaching, continuous learning, and professional development.
text.3: Loss of retinal photoreceptor cells is a critical event in loss of vision. A new, albeit tentative, strategy to rectify the loss of photoreceptor cells involves reprogramming fibroblasts into chemically induced photoreceptor-like cells.
